articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Nottingham Forest host Burnley in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Nottm Forest v Burnley - team news & build-up

articles.description: Jenni Hermoso is not included in Spain's first squad since winning the Women's World Cup, but 15 members of that triumphant team are named.
articles.title: Spain call up 15 World Cup winners but Hermoso left out

articles.description: There are plenty of challenges to come but, considering their build-up and second half performance against Japan, England are in a good place at the Rugby World Cup, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: 'Improving England were the best they've been under Borthwick'

articles.description: Diane Caldwell says the Republic of Ireland qualified for their first World Cup "in spite" of then manager Vera Pauw.
articles.title: Republic World Cup qualification 'in spite' of Pauw

articles.description: A judge at Bennell's sentencing in 2020 describes the abuser as "the devil incarnate".
articles.title: Paedophile football coach Barry Bennell dies in prison

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland and Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp star in the weekend's funniest moments from Match of the Day 2's '2 Good 2 Bad'.
articles.title: Haaland & Klopp star in weekend's funniest moments

articles.description: England's Chelsea Pitman, who won gold at the 2018 Commonwealth Games, announces her retirement from international netball.
articles.title: England's Pitman retires from international netball

articles.description: Defender Lucy Parker replaces Lotte Wubben-Moy in the England squad for this month's Women's Nations League matches.
articles.title: Parker replaces injured Wubben-Moy in England squad

articles.description: The Denver Broncos pull off a "Hail Mary" play alongside the rest of the NFL plays of the week from the second round of games.
articles.title: Denver pull off 'Hail Mary' in NFL plays of the week

articles.description: England Netball apologises for using images of different players in an attempt to wish Razia Quashie happy birthday on social media.
articles.title: England Netball sorry for mixing up black players
